markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">
[Field of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=1526)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 331 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Renewal](/Lessons.aspx?ID=25)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A field of life energy fills the area, exuding warmth and rejuvenating those within. Each living creature that starts its turn in the area regains 1d8 Hit Points, and any [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature that starts its turn in the area takes 1d8 vitality damage.

---
**Heightened (8th)** The healing and damage increase to 1d10.

**Heightened (9th)** The healing and damage increase to 1d12.
name: Field of Life

</row>

---

<summary>
Create a vital energy field that heals those who remain within.
</summary>
summary: Create a vital energy field that heals those who remain within.
summary_markdown: Create a vital energy field that heals those who remain within.
text: Field of Life Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 331 2.0 Traditions Divine, Primal Lesson Lesson of Renewal Range 30 feet Area 20-foot burst Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- A field of life energy fills the area, exuding warmth and rejuvenating those within. Each living creature that starts its turn in the area regains 1d8 Hit Points, and any undead creature that starts its turn in the area takes 1d8 vitality damage. --- Heightened (8th) The healing and damage increase to 1d10. Heightened (9th) The healing and damage increase to 1d12.
